# Module Documentation

## Module Network.HTTP.MimeType

#### `MimeType`

``` purescript
newtype MimeType
  = MimeType String
```


#### `eqMimeType`

``` purescript
instance eqMimeType :: Eq MimeType
```


#### `showMimeType`

``` purescript
instance showMimeType :: Show MimeType
```
